Trade/Device Name(s): i-STAT CG4+ Cartridge with the i-STAT 1 System
Regulation Name(s): Blood Gases (PCO2, PO2) and Blood pH Test System
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Amperometric measurement of oxygen reduction current
Amperometric measurement of oxidized hydrogen peroxide (lactate oxidase)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for i-STAT CG4+ cartridge with the i-STAT 1 System for quantification of pH, PO2, PCO2, and lactate in whole blood at point-of-care or laboratory settings
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantification of pH, PO2, PCO2, and lactate in arterial or venous whole blood in point-of-care or clinical laboratory settings to aid in diagnosis, monitoring, and treatment of respiratory, acid-base, and lactic acidosis conditions
